27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that the Messenger of Allah said:"Beware of Zann (suspicion), for indeed Zann is the falsest of speech

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي ظَنِّ السُّوءِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Bad Suspicion
